description.en:
Ch.1-5 Unforgettable Days - About a couple who drifted apart after the girlfriend who is his senpai graduated and started going to a university. Few years later when he entered a university he met her again but to find out she is now a slut.  
  
Ch.6 Freestyle - About athletic sister who is bored and has sex with her little brother.  
  
Ch.7 Parting Gift of Summer - Two childhood friends who live next door get intimate over summer.  
  
Ch.8 Careless Kid - Guy who mistakes a porn star for his senpai.
